name: astrosteveo-plugins
description: A collection of Claude plugins developed by astrosteveo to enhance productivity and project management.

plugins.name: agent-workflow
plugins.description: A rigorous, systematic development workflow for coding agents. Enforces discovery, planning, TDD, and review phases to keep agents on track.

plugins.name: explore-plan-implement-commit
plugins.description: Adaptive development workflow for all skill levels. Guides users from brainstorming through exploration, design, planning, implementation, and commit.
